resources.string: Pause workflow for a period of time
Display a brief message at the bottom of the screen.
The message content to display is empty, cannot execute
Get current content from system clipboard (text or image)
Launch a specified application or one of its internal pages (Activity).
Unable to find launch intent for the app. Please confirm the app is installed or the Activity name is correct
Force stop the specified application (requires Shizuku or Root)
Brightness must be a number between 0 and 255
Write specified text or image content to system clipboard
Cannot create safe image URI for clipboard: %s
Turn off screen to put device in sleep mode. Requires Shizuku or Root permission.
Wake up screen and dismiss swipe lock. Only for devices without password. Requires Shizuku or Root permission.
Show a dialog to request user input for text, number, time or date.
Click on a screen element, coordinate or view ID
View ID \'%s\' ACTION_CLICK failed, trying gesture click
Successfully clicked view ID \'%s\' via ACTION_CLICK
Gesture click at (%d, %d) failed or cancelled
Input text into the currently focused input field (supports Accessibility and Shell)
Unable to find focused input field or field does not support editing.
Trying to input via vFlow IME...
IME mode failed, falling back to clipboard+paste mode...
Shell command execution failed. Please check Root/Shizuku permissions and IME settings.
Unable to input text. Please ensure an input field is focused.
Normally and unconditionally terminate the current workflow execution
Immediately terminate current loop execution and jump to steps after the loop body
Cannot break: not currently in a loop.
Skip remaining steps of current loop and directly enter next iteration
Read value from a named variable or magic variable for use in subsequent steps
Get local or external IP address of the device
Manually start this workflow by clicking a button
Create a custom notification in the system notification bar
This is a message from vFlow.
Trigger workflow at specified time and date, like an alarm clock
Trigger this workflow when specified app opens or closes
Trigger workflow when battery level meets specific condition
Trigger when Bluetooth state or device connection changes
Trigger this workflow when specified physical key is pressed (requires Shizuku or Root)
Trigger workflow when notification matching criteria is received
Trigger workflow when UI element matching the selector appears
Parse GKD format subscription rules and trigger workflow
Trigger workflow when SMS meeting specific criteria is received
Trigger workflow when Wi-Fi state or network connection changes
Trigger workflow when entering or leaving a specific area
Create a new variable, optionally name it for later modification or reading
Variable name \'%s\' already exists, please use another name
Modify the value of an existing named variable
Please select a valid named variable
Cannot find variable named \'%s\'. Please create it first using the "Create Variable" module
Create new random variable, optionally name it for later modification or reading
Variable name \'%s\' already exists, please use another name
Min value cannot be greater than max value
Cannot create random variable of type \'%s\'
Perform text operations like join, split, replace, regex extraction
Need a list variable to join
Source text and find content cannot be empty
Source text and regex pattern cannot be empty
Input is not a valid image variable
Cannot create new image entry in gallery
Cannot open output stream for new image file
Perform mathematical operations between two numbers
Encode or decode text using Base64
Input text is not a valid Base64 encoded format
Add comments to document your workflow design. Will be skipped during execution.
Send HTTP request and get response
Execute different operations based on condition
Execute operations here when condition is not met
Repeat a group of operations fixed number of times
Repeat while condition is true until condition is not met
End point of While loop block
Iterate through each item in a list and execute operations
End point of ForEach loop block
Jump to specified step in workflow and continue execution
Stop current workflow execution and return a value
Capture screen screenshot using vFlow Core, based on scrcpy implementation
Execute Shell commands via vFlow Core (supports Shell/Root permissions)
Send key events using vFlow Core, faster and more stable than accessibility service
Read current screen status using vFlow Core
Turn off screen using vFlow Core
Wake up screen using vFlow Core
Submit form or trigger event when clicked.
Activity definition complete, launch activity and start listening for events.
Float window definition complete, launch float window and start listening for events.
Float window launched, waiting for action...
Listen for click or modification events on specified component.
This module must be placed inside the "Show Activity" block.
Target component must be a UI component object
Modify component properties (such as text, visibility, layout).
Target component ID cannot be empty
Get UI component object or its value.
Component \'%s\' does not exist in current activity
Actively exit and destroy current activity.
This module must be placed inside the "Show Activity" block.
Display various types of content (text, numbers, images, etc.) in a float window.
Cannot get UI service to display content.
Use system share function to share text or images.
Cannot get UI service to perform share operation.
Share operation failed to start or was cancelled
Turn on, off, or toggle Wi-Fi state.
Find SMS from inbox by conditions, support verification code extraction.
Execute Intent, open links, send broadcasts or start services.
Get screen usage time statistics for apps on device.
No usage data retrieved. Please ensure "Usage Access Permission" is granted and system has recorded data.
No app usage records in specified time period
Turn on, off, or toggle Bluetooth state.
This device does not support Bluetooth.
Command to execute cannot be empty.
Quick access to Alipay\'s scan, payment code, collection code, etc.
Quick access to WeChat\'s collection code, payment code.
Adjust image parameters like exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.
Need an image variable as input.
Need an image variable as input.
Find screen elements by text, ID, region and other properties, supports multi-property combination filtering
Please set at least one search condition
Find text requires accessibility service, but it is not currently running.
Cannot get root node of current window.
No matching text found on screen: \'%s\' (match mode: %s)
Interact with Operit AI assistant: send messages or trigger workflows.
Wait for result timeout, but message was sent
Call LLM API (OpenAI/DeepSeek) for intelligent conversation.
Response format not as expected: message.content does not exist
Find all visible notifications in current status bar.
Need notification listener permission to find notifications.
Remove one or more notifications from status bar.
Need notification listener permission to remove notifications.
Input is not a valid notification object or notification list.
Start workflow when content (text, image, file) is shared to vFlow.
Split text into a list using a delimiter. If delimiter is empty, split by character.
Replace specified content in text with new content
Dynamic module defined based on manifest.json
Replay recorded touch sequence, adjustable playback speed
vFlow Core service not running. Please ensure Shizuku or Root permission is granted.
Please record touch operations in editor first
Execute Lua script, can call other module functions.
Lua script content cannot be empty.
Key code must be a number
Target position is empty. Please ensure coordinates are set or connected to upstream module\'s coordinate output.
Target position format is invalid. Requires Coordinate type or \"x,y\" format string.
vFlow Core service is not running. Please ensure Shizuku or Root permissions are granted.
Command to execute cannot be empty.
Fully autonomous AI assistant. Understands screen content based on vision and UI structure to automatically complete tasks
Replicate AutoGLM project. Execute complex mobile operation tasks based on Chain of Thought (CoT) and custom instruction protocols
Use vFlow Core to control Bluetooth state (on/off/toggle).
Use vFlow Core to read clipboard content.
Use vFlow Core to input text, faster and more stable than accessibility service.
Use vFlow Core to perform tap, long press, or swipe operations, faster and more stable than accessibility service.
Use vFlow Core to set clipboard content.
Execute system-level operations such as back, home, open notification, etc.
Apply Material You style rounded rectangle mask to image
Select an image from gallery or files
Find area on screen that matches template image, return center coordinate of match
Continuously find text on screen until it appears or timeout. Supports OCR fallback
Recognize text in image, or find coordinates of specified text
Perform tap, long press, or swipe operations on screen
Use GKD selector syntax to find screen controls
Continuously find specified text on screen until found
Long pressing coordinate (%d, %d) for %dms via vFlow Core...
Reading screen status via vFlow Core...
Turning off screen via vFlow Core...
Waking up screen via vFlow Core...
Use vFlow Core to read current Bluetooth switch state.
Reading Bluetooth state via vFlow Core...
Use vFlow Core to force stop a specific app.
Get package name of current foreground app.
Get list of currently running apps.
Use vFlow Core to read current mobile data switch state.
Use vFlow Core to enable or disable mobile data.
Use vFlow Core to enable or disable WiFi.
Use vFlow Core to read current WiFi switch state.
Reading WiFi state via vFlow Core...
Control WiFi state using vFlow Core (on/off/toggle).
App package name cannot be empty.
Brightness value must be a number between 0 and 255.
Cannot find focused input box, or input box does not support editing.
Shell command failed, please check Root/Shizuku permissions and input method settings.
Cannot input text, please ensure an input box is focused.
Overlay permission required to record touch operations
Control volume for different audio streams using vFlow Core (music/notification/ring etc).
Read current volume levels for different audio streams using vFlow Core.
Use vFlow Core to control NFC state (Enable/Disable/Toggle).
Use vFlow Core to read the current NFC state.
Play built-in system sounds or local audio files, with volume control support.
Please select a local audio file
